short_summary: We need a medical director to oversee and support diagnostic imaging services in Ontario.
description: The Correctional Service requires a Medical Director to provide oversight and support to diagnostic imaging services. The Medical Director will collaborate with staff to ensure high-quality service delivery and continually improve the quality of services. Key responsibilities include leading the Diagnostic Imaging Review Committee, providing guidance on clinical practices, and ensuring compliance with Accreditation Canada standards.

full_summary:
### Medical Director Diagnostic Imaging

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-846-77760703
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** 21401-28-4699178
* **Notice Publication Date:** May 23, 2024
* **Bidding Closing Date:** June 14, 2024 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** June 30, 2027
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Category:** Services
* **Location:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)

#### Tender Description

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking the services of a radiologist to act as the Medical Director, Diagnostic Imaging in the Ontario Region. The incumbent will provide clinical oversight, guidance, and support to imaging staff in relation to patient care. Key objectives include:

* Providing regular consultation services to imaging staff
* Attending Diagnostic Imaging Review Committee meetings
* Regular reporting to management on diagnostic imaging services
* Delivering staff education sessions on diagnostic imaging
* Conducting site visits to review diagnostic imaging equipment and suites

#### Specifications

* The contractor must provide a minimum of 8 hours per month in consultation services to imaging staff and management.
* The contractor must attend Diagnostic Imaging Review Committee meetings quarterly.
* The contractor must provide a yearly summary report detailing strengths and areas for improvement in diagnostic imaging services.
* The contractor must deliver a minimum of one staff education session on diagnostic imaging per year.
* The contractor must conduct a site visit to review diagnostic imaging equipment and suites.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest price.

#### Documentation

The tender documentation can be found at [www.canadabuys.ca](http://www.canadabuys.ca) under Tender Notice 38723.

#### Contact Information

* Danielle Murdoch, Buying Agent
* Phone: 343-422-4831
* Email: [danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca). 

Note: This text is a rewritten version of the original text, reorganized and edited for clarity and concision in a professional manner. It adheres to the 400-word limit while maintaining essential details and information.
